thread.title: Ground News - Doctors surprised that "Miracle" Baby born without eyes and had half her brain removed is 'living and growing well'
thread.title_full: Ground News - Doctors surprised that "Miracle" Baby born without eyes and had half her brain removed is 'living and growing well'

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Doctors surprised that "Miracle" Baby born without eyes and had half her brain removed is 'living and growing well'
text:
Summary by Ground News North Carolina mom Allyanna Carter, 19, found out she was pregnant in November 2022 and suffered no complications. At 1 day old, Harlym had a seizure and a CT confirmed she'd been born without eyes. Doctors said she wouldn't be able to talk or walk, use the right side of her body and she'd have global delay.
